I'm pulling up several seeds, usually around 29. But then I'm hit with a .json can't download error. I'm wondering If this is related to the DailyStomer having problems on TOR. Since ZeroNet makes use of TOR and none of this should be happening.

Apparently Cisco, who owns OpenDNS, is refusing to resolve to the Daily Stormer's new site.

ANDREW ANGLIN AND GREG JOHNSON DISCUSS THE ALT RIGHT (BITCHUTE EXCLUSIVE)

https://www.bitchute.com/video/Hz23dgJZNvWs/

So its pretty much time to dump OpenDNS for private use. And of course I wouldn't recommend that without at least one solution.

Check out the OpenNIC project https://www.opennicproject.org/

The Daily Stormer was using a .cat domain for a little while and they were suddenly dumped again.

So http://dstormer6em3i4km.onion/
